definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
Sandu Shuizu autonomous county in Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南州[Qian2 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou
pinyin: San1 du1 shui3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

sentences.english: In another game, as the turtle swims across the oceanarium.
sentences.chinese: 在另一场游戏中，当海龟游过水族馆时。

sentences.english: I would have raised enough money to buy them away from the Seaquarium and set them free.
sentences.chinese: 我会攒够足够的钱从水族馆把他们买走，放他们自由。

sentences.english: There is an oceanarium located inside and also lots of waterworks.
sentences.chinese: 位于内有一个水族馆，也是水厂手。

sentences.english: Lujiazui Area also has Ocean Aquarium and Riverside Promenade, etc.
sentences.chinese: 陆家嘴区域还包含海洋水族馆，滨江大道等。

sentences.english: Lithuania's main aquarium is celebrating the birth of two baby dolphins.
sentences.chinese: 立陶宛的主水族馆正在庆祝二只小海豚的生日。

sentences.english: This aquarium tank from the ice structure, ornamental fish frozen in the inside.
sentences.chinese: 这种水族缸由冰块构成，观赏鱼被冷冻在了里面。

sentences.english: The Monterey Bay Aquarium shows visitors the underwater life in the bay.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特里湾水族馆向游客展现了该海湾里的海洋生物。

sentences.english: You may also work in an aquarium or a zoo.
sentences.chinese: 你可以工作在水族馆或者动物园。

sentences.english: Shown in the figure is 100 feet long aquarium submarine channels.
sentences.chinese: 图中所示的是水族馆内长达100英尺的海底通道。

sentences.english: The little girl was fascinated by all the fish swimming in the aquarium tanks.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩被水族箱中所有鱼的泳姿所吸引入神。

sentences.english: Everybody knew that the aquarium is the raising aquatic animal's place.
sentences.chinese: 大家知道水族馆是饲养水生动物的地方。

sentences.english: After many years development, REHAU aquarium product establishes a good reputation within the customers.
sentences.chinese: 经过多年发展，瑞好水族在客户中建立了良好的声誉。

sentences.english: And the Pacific aquatics, I beg you punish one person, me.
sentences.chinese: 对不起太平洋水族，您就处罚我一个人吧。

sentences.english: Lesser quality stones have been used in quantities in ornamental gardens and as aquarium stones.
sentences.chinese: 小部分的雨花石已被用于花园装饰和水族馆用石。

sentences.english: Goldfish are very attractive when they swim in aquariums or fish bowls .
sentences.chinese: 金鱼在水族箱或鱼缸里游动时十分漂亮。

sentences.english: There are about a thousand fish of different species in the aquarium, which is approximately 50 metres long.
sentences.chinese: 长达50米的水族箱里养着上千种不同种类的鱼。

definition: palace of the Dragon King at the bottom of the Eastern Sea
Tu or White Mongol ethnic group of Qinghai
Chi You, legendary creator of metalworking and weapons/comet
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
(archaic) the four rivers (Yangtze 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1], Yellow 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2], Huai 淮河[Huai2 He2], Ji 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3])/(TCM) acupuncture point SJ-9
the Dragon King of the Eastern Sea (mythology)
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
